portfolio.story: I was born and raised in Vietnam. I graduated a university in my country in 2014. When I was working in Vietnam, I met some people studying abroad and told me about their adventures. From that, I wanted to get out of my comfort zone and see the world. I came to Finland on my own as a student again. I was studying and working at the same time and started my in-depth front-end programming journey. Since then, I have made a lot of projects, from basic HTML pages to complex projects like a React library. I hope to be a great fullstack developer and get my dream job in the future.
portfolio.intro: Besides coding, I also like to read blogs, anime and listen to music. My favorite animes are Naruto Uzumaki, Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba, InuYasha: Dog Demon and so on.

mainProjects.name: Shopping cart
mainProjects.description: An e-commerce web built with ReactJS, redux where customers can choose products, change the quantity and check total price.

mainProjects.name: To do list
mainProjects.description: A to-do-list app built with redux-thunk, send requests to backend API to get all to-do-list, create a new todo, update & delete todo

mainProjects.name: User management
mainProjects.description: A website validate user's info when filling the registration form. Becoming the member of the team and edit your information!

mainProjects.name: Virtual fitting room
mainProjects.description: A a digital dressing room built with react, redux where you can easily find your unique style, combine items together, try on.

mainProjects.name: Fish shrimp crab game
mainProjects.description: Fish Shrimp Crab dice game is a Vietnamese lucky game which often used in lunar new year. This website is built with ReactJS

mainProjects.name: Login form
mainProjects.description: A small project built with reactjs, redux-saga, antd library, uses yup-formik to validate form, helps to get access token & user's infor

otherProjects.name: Group chat app
otherProjects.description: A demo UI for gamers to send message in the chat room.

otherProjects.name: Order burger
otherProjects.description: A small app built with reactjs, redux to help user order a burger

otherProjects.name: Honda website
otherProjects.description: A cloned web from Honda website.

otherProjects.name: Rock paper scissors
otherProjects.description: Rock paper scissors game built using ReactJS, Redux

otherProjects.name: Try on glasses
otherProjects.description: A website helps users can choose the best glasses and allowing them to try it on the model

otherProjects.name: Calculator web
otherProjects.description: Calculator app built using ReactJS, Redux
